scripts.bump: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run tag:publish
scripts.patch:beta: npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm run tag:publish
scripts.minor:beta: npm version preminor --preid=beta && npm run tag:publish
scripts.major:beta: npm version premajor --preid=beta && npm run tag:publish
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run tag:publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run tag:publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run tag:publish
scripts.tag:publish: git push origin && git push public && git push public $(git tag --points-at HEAD)
